name: The Ghosts Don't Feel Pain
description:
The Ghosts Don't Feel pain is a top down action game about killing ghosts.

Your character, Von Remington,  is on a quest to loot three abandoned mansions of their riches however to get to it, he needs to fight the ghosts that haunt them.

Dash through obstacles, swing your axe and grapple onto enemies in 15 levels.

Collect four trophies for each level by completing each level and..

  • Kill all enemies
  • Complete within a time limit
  • Get hit less than 5 times
  • and find the hidden stack of coins

Any feedback is appreciated!

Minor blood warning ( as seen in screenshots )

This was made using Godot 4.0
